column4: ɔwo na mema me kra do mema wo."
wo mu na medze mo werɛ mahyɛ
column5: Mma mma m’enyim nngu ase; Mma mma m’atamfo nnka me nnhyɛ."

column3: mma mma hɔn a wɔtwer wo no mu biara enyim nngu ase: Mbom hɔn a wɔka atorsɛm gyan no na ma hɔn enyi nto."

column2: "Kyerɛkyerɛ me ma menantsew wɔ wo nokwar no mu; Na ɔwo nye mo nkwagye Nyankopɔn; Ɔwo na motwer wo mber nyinara."

column3: kaa w’ehumbɔbɔr na w’adɔyɛ; A ɔwɔ hɔ fi tsetse no."
anaaso me mbrato: Kaa me dɛ mbrɛ w’adɔyɛ tse
column6: na dɛ mbrɛ wo yieyɛ so tse."

column2: "Ɔnam dɛ EWURADZE ye na ɔtsen ntsi: Ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo kwan a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔfa do."
"Ɔdze ahobrɛadzefo fa ɔkwan tsenenee do: Na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ hɔn ne pɛ."
"EWURADZE dze adɔyɛ na nokwardzi kyerɛkyerɛ Hɔn a wodzi n’ahyɛmu na ne mbrasɛm do no."

column4: wo dzin ntsi Fa m’emumuyɛ kyɛ me

column3: Ɔno na EWURADZE bɛkyerɛkyerɛ no kwan a ɔmfa do."

column2: "Ne kra bɛtsena hɔ dwudwoodwo; Na n’asefo benya asaase no edzi."
"EWURADZE da n’etsirmpɔw edzi kyerɛ hɔn a wosuro no; Na ɔkyerɛ hɔn n’ahyɛmu no."

column3: Osiandɛ ɔno na obeyi m’anan efi efir mu."
dan w’enyi bra mo do na hu me mbɔbɔr; Na meyɛ ankonam na ɔwerɛhonyi."

column2: "M’akoma mu ɔfona adɔɔ so: Ao yi me fi m’ahokyer mu."
"Hwɛ m’amandzehu na m’atseetsee; Na fa mo bɔn nyinara kyɛ me."
"Hwɛ m’atamfo hɔn dodow; Na etsiɔdzen kyir a wokyir me."

column3: na gye me: Mma mma m’enyim nngu ase
column4: na ɔwo wo mu na mo werɛ hyɛ."

column2: "Ma nokwardzi na tsenenee nkora mo do
column3: Osiandɛ ɔwo na m’enyi da wo kwan."

column4: gye wo man Israel Fi no fona nyinara mu."
